Today, I will proudly sign @SteveScalise discharge petition to force floor consideration of the Born-Alive Survivors Protection Act. This is the chance for each representative to be held accountable and for us to #EndInfanticide.
Due process protects life, liberty, and property. The Dem’s #VAWA proposal changes the due process balance. If the Dems were serious about passing this bill, they would simply reauthorize the act.

This week, the House will vote to reauthorize the Violence Against Women Act, #VAWA. This important legislation deserves to be reauthorized. Unfortunately, the Dem’s measure contains unconstitutional poison pills.
